website_summaries.verdict: Decent size on this dome tent that can sleep up to six people.
pros: Center height on the dome is six feet
Rain fly and tent stakes included
Easy for a novice to set up
Can be set up by one person
Has an electrical cord access port and lantern hook
cons: Back and side windows do not have a cover unless the rain fly is on

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tent and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This tent was awesome. I was looking for something that was easy for one person to set up for when I take my dogs out by myself but still wanted a big enough tent to fit my husband myself and our two large dogs. We purchased a couple cots to go in as well and it all worked so great together. I told my husband I wanted to set it up by myself for our first use to make sure that it was doable and was surprised with how quickly it went. Loved leaving the rain cover off and getting the amazing views of the stars at night. I would recommend this tent to anyone looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey D.

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Never thought i'd find such a great tent that was so simple to set up! Get this if you want to set up within 10 mins! And that is coming from a girly girl who cant follow directions at all. Great also inside, you can stand up in it, I'm 5'4 and id say there was maybe 2 inches of room left or more. I fit my Full size mattress in there with no problem and plenty of more space, you can fit up to a Queen in there with some room still to move around. The material is nice, held up in a really bad storm and pouring rain. Great tent for a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: Br33zy

customer_reviews.title: Wow was this a great deal
customer_reviews.text: Wow was this a great deal. My last tent was a 3 person tent and this is sooo much better even just for 3 people. It says it can fit two queen size air mattresses and it sure can even though I've only ever used one. My son and I like to camp and this is easy to put up and has held up great. For the money it is a steal. Try going to a store to buy a similar tent and you'll spend 3-5 times as much as this easily.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: It's AWESOME! Great construction - looks cool and the company ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from my first weekend using the tent. It's AWESOME! Great construction - looks cool and the company that builds the tent is first class. I emailed them with a couple of questions and they got back to me right away. Very good customer service. A++
customer_reviews.author: Christine K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tent for a family, easy up & down
customer_reviews.text: This tent is perfect! I purchased it for a family camp out at our local YMCA & it was a great size for a family of 4 and all of their stuff. It is easily assembled and disassembled by one person, but two people make the task even easier. I'm 5'3" and managed to wrangle the whole thing back into the package. I do recommend giving it a trial run before your trip just to assure you have the instructions correct and are ready to go & not look silly on the camp site!
customer_reviews.author: L. Noll

customer_reviews.title: Big! Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Tent is a lot bigger then I thought it would be and it’s super easy to set up. After a couple trips with it I have ZERO issues. I’d definitely recommend Core to anyone who doesn’t want to pay the big name prices for the same tent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy worst ripper design ever.. always got caught when trying to zip up in the ripper flap and the transition where the flap over laps so stupid I’ll be buying a new tent next year
customer_reviews.author: steven messner

customer_reviews.title: Very Reliable!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this tent!!! We used this tent this past weekend at the Epicenter Festival in Rockingham, NC. We had TERRIBLE storms that caused major damages (tents, canopy's, stages blown down) but not our tent!!! People were even stopping to ask what kind of tent we had because it was still standing!!! It was still dry inside as well....we are VERY VERY pleased with this tent and would highly recommend it !!! I would have given it a 10 if possible!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Tyree

customer_reviews.title: Good tent
customer_reviews.text: I used this for one person (cot) plus chair & small table, plus large dog for car camping. I couldn’t imagine any smaller. Loved the standing height inside. Because it’s a dome tent, it feels small inside - more like a 4-person tent. Also, I could see a small table in the center and having 4 chairs to hang out with people (could make a great mess tent). This is a “fair weather” tent, though. The tops and sides have a LOT of mesh, but when you put the fly on, all your visibility goes away. Very private. The door and front have zip covers for privacy. Floor was sturdy. For the cheap price, it was great.
customer_reviews.author: LRC5555

customer_reviews.title: Spacious family tent
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded as the kids are bigger now. Nice to finally have a tent I can stand up in (6'4"). We only slept three and had plenty of space. There weather stripping around the door easily hangs up the zipper, so you need to be careful. Set up solo is a little difficult, but can be done. The bottom is a nice heavy material, and there are plenty of tie-downs on the cover. Overall a very nice budget tent.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while back in anticipation of convincing my boyfriend to go camping with me, so we just took it out for the first time this last week. Just a guest of wind, about 10-15 mph, it was knocked down. A portion of the part that holds the tent rods tore and one of the rods split. We were able to get it back up, but the damn tent fly kept sticking and then eventually broke. This was a two day camping trip. It didn't last a two day camping trip. It was so mangled and useless after the two days that we just dumped it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurnil

customer_reviews.title: Cord in poles broke on second use
customer_reviews.text: We used this tent once, and the next time we used it, the cord in the poles had snapped. We aren’t sure how - they were in the bag in a closet - but when we open the bag again, they were broken. Very unhappy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Sage

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome. The air vents do make a difference. Another thing that we notice was that my buddies tent had sugar ants. They somehow got through the net part of the tent. His tent was a Coleman. My tent never had ants inside. We noticed the net was threaded a lot more than my buddies tent. Threaded enough that sugar ants couldn't get through. The tent is durable and a lot bigger than what it looks like in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: ALeGault

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used this tent camping in Western NC for a week. Only received light rain and I ALWAYS put a tarp under and over my tent when car camping (which I was) so I can’t vouch for it under heavy rain. But I can say it held up well for the week. As. A 6’5” male, I did have a bit of trouble getting in and out of the doorway of the tent. There was ample room inside the tent though. Setup was as easy as any tent of this style.
customer_reviews.author: SemiSecure

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tent!
customer_reviews.text: Used this tent for the first time the other day, super easy to set up! We did this in the dark by only the headlights of our car and still only took us about 10 minutes. If you are camping where it's warm, make sure to stake the rain fly open on the sides. We forgot this step and ended up sweltering in the morning. Our mistake though, if you stake the rain fly properly you should get plenty of air flow. Definitely recommend if you're looking for a medium-large size tent on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: mitchphilipp

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to set up and quite roomy
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to set up and quite roomy. I prefer to sleep on a cot so this tent had a lot of room. This is a fairly easy tent to set up even for one person. I prefer to sleep on a cot so there was plenty of room. More of a three season tent.
customer_reviews.author: thomas p. stephens

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tent for our family of 4!
customer_reviews.text: We're taking our kids camping for the 1st time (they are 6 & 4 years old), so we needed a big enough tent to fit all 4 of us comfortably. This tent totally fits the bill! It's a great deal for the price & very well made. It has vents all around, 2 small side pockets & a hanging net at the top center. I'll update my review if anything goes wrong with use, but so far, so good! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Peachie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. After 4 days it had holes torn in the sidewalls, door zipper broke, and the structure could not stand up to the wind. I eventually gave up and slept outside.
customer_reviews.author: Agamotto Abides

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Went camping to Palo Dura Canyon in Texas and tent was exposed to wind, rain and hail. It stood up to all and did well. No rain got into tent. I used different stakes the ones that came with tent are too small. Also went camping in Gilla National Park, tent performed good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tent and used it once. It held up great in some not so great weather (wind and rain). When taking the tent down, we misplaced some stakes and a pole. I've been trying to call customer service to get a replacement but they never answer. I've left messages, but they don't call. If it weren't for the customer service, this would earn a five-star review.
customer_reviews.author: catkandwill

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of searching for tents and finally got around to getting this one. It did great in the sun as well as the down pour. There was no water leakage even in the little air vent at the bottom of the tent. The top half is all mesh without the rain cover which was nice for when it got warm. The zippers also held up really well when they'd get a little caught in the rain guard flaps. All in all. Super happy. And it was simple to set up.
customer_reviews.author: La Le Lu Li Lo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent! Our last camping trip was 4 nights ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tent! Our last camping trip was 4 nights of heavy wind and substantial rain. This tent did great! Not a drop of water made it inside and the tent stayed put using MSR Groundhog stakes!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great tent - very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. I am 5'10 and can fully stand in it! Fits 2 queen size mattresses and seems to be very good in heavy rain. Has great outlet whole for electric cable and nice net packet at the top where you can put all your phones, wallets etc. you can also hang a flash light from the top. Overall satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Halla

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Tent
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my old tent due to a zipper malfunction. This tent is a wonderful new addition to my camping gear. It is very easy to set up and it stood up to the windstorm we had on out second day. My only issue is that it doesn't have a solid area above the door it is all screen so you cannot completely close it off from the dew. But that was easily fixed with a spare towel.
customer_reviews.author: TwilightMystic

customer_reviews.title: Not good. Don't purchase if you wanna stay dry.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a camping trip. No windows so poor ventilation. Had a rain storm and ended up with piddles on the floor and water dripping on our faces. After two uses noticed a quarter sized hole in the mesh. Not sure if it came that way or happened when using, either way, bad quality. I would not recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmAnDa

customer_reviews.title: Good for 4 people, dog & gear
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Fit group of 4 people, dog & gear very comfortably - Air Vent - Bottom of tent is strong - Big open netting for star gazing Cons: - Heavy for backpacking - Tent parts don't all fit back inside tent carrying bag - Claims it fits six people but that would be very swished - Pole hole material is weak and easily ripped
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and pack out. Kept us dry during half a day of rain. Vents really well with no condensation build up. You can fit a queen air mattress through the door fully inflated. The ONLY qualm I have about this tent (and its tiny) I just wish the front door had a full screen instead of the half screen window. Amazing tent for the price! You can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Barbour

customer_reviews.title: This is a good buy for the money I paid for it
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy for the money I paid for it. It also a little bigger than I thought, it worked out well didn't leak in the rain. I would certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley-Donna Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great ventilation!
customer_reviews.text: We used the tent last Holy Week here in Asturias, Cebu, Philippines. In the summer heat of Philippine weather we are very amazed because of the great ventilation it provided.
customer_reviews.author: gncampos

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well in the rain!
customer_reviews.text: THIS TENT IS AMAZING YA’LL! Just used it at a music festival-and was sooo impressed. First of all-it’s huge! So roomy, and my fiancé and I were able to stand up inside which was fabulous. Set up and take down of the tent was also pretty easy. The main reason I wanted to write this review, is because this tent was a BOSS in the rain!! There was several intense thunderstorms and down pours one evening, and this tent held up incredibly well!! For the most part we stayed totally dry. Super happy with this tent, totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some flaws, but an alright tent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tent for a recent 7 day trip. It rained two days, and the inside of the tent got significantly wet the second rain day. The zipper got caught in the fabric every time you zipped or unzipped. We pulled the stakes out after taking the tent down, and they were all bent. It is a decent tent, but probably could find better for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great tent, stays dry, can stand up!
customer_reviews.text: Just used this and was an easy setup and take down. Rain fly held well and heat out all moisture in several very heavy downpours. Two interior side pockets and ceiling net with hook mean lights/lanterns and phones have a place so not getting stepped on. Plus I am 6”1’ and can stand up in this so changing and dressing I don’t have to pretend to be Quasimodo the hunchback while inside getting ready. 8>)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Zipper gets stuck a lot when opening and closing. Just pull the piece that is stuck.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up for two people. Very spacious and roomy for 2 people and 1 child. We decided to throw in a twin size tall air mattress and it fit great. Wind ventilation system is outstanding. Can’t wait to go on my next camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great option for car camping
customer_reviews.text: My family of 3 use this tent for mostly winter camping in the southeastern US. This tent is plenty waterproof to handle 24 hours of straight rain, it keeps moisture down with the interior mesh & air vent, and stays warm enough (it is a tent after all). It is far too heavy for anything other than car camping.. but on the upside, with a family of 3 we are able to fit a small folding table inside the tent, so we have a second level of storage to keep everything tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: We got this tent for just two of us to upgrade from our smaller 2-person tent as we wanted a bit more space. It was big enough for a queen air mattress, all of our luggage, and plenty of space to move around. It went up fairly easy and seemed stable and durable. It kept us and all of our belongings dry during multiple rain showers, aside from the typical dampness from the humidity, but no leaks. Seems like a decent tent for the price! We’ll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Emenell

customer_reviews.title: Pole broken on 3rd use!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is easy to set up, tear down, and store in the small bag it comes with. It even stayed nice and dry during a heavy rainfall. However, on our third time setting up the tent, one of the poles split length-wise. Will be contacting the manufacturer about this problem. If they can take care of it, my rating for this tent would definitely increase.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy tent.
customer_reviews.text: Really great tent. Rained hard the first time we used it and nothing got wet, even damp. Stayed completely dry! Really tall tent. My BF is 6'3'' and is very comfy in this tent. I would say it fits 3 people and a pet very comfortably. 4 people would work - anymore than that would be very squished. Very easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: lauren b.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent but not for me
customer_reviews.text: The way the door is shaped makes it hard for zipping and unzipping as the zipper gets stuck on the flap covers. The sharp side slopes affect ones ability to stand except in the middle. The lift of the tent doorway bottom made it difficult for Someone with mobility issues to step into the tent
customer_reviews.author: rumba

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is amazing considering its low cost - roomy, fairly light-weight, extremely easy to put up and take down and it really holds up well in the rain. We just survived a massive downpour while camping up on the Mogollon Rim in Arizona. We love this tent and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: stan clark

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent. Easy to erect and roomy and comfy inside. I only use it in Hawaii, so not sure how it would fare in inclement weather. (We don't have that on Maui...)
customer_reviews.author: elaloha

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: This is not an instant tent. It works better with 2 persons to help set up. I didn’t read carefully when I bought it. I should had spent another $40 for an instant tent; easy to set up & fast folding.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't leak.
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty easy to set up. It rained the 1st weekend we went camping and by rain I mean a down pour (there was a mud slide near us) half the first day we got there and the 2 nights we staid, and it held up good didn't leak. This last weekend it was beautiful and it was amazing the vents it has didn't make it to hot in the tent. Will be buying another because we bought a smaller tent and it was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Eric worden

customer_reviews.title: Really nice tent with plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits a queen mattress with room to stand inside... A big plus when changing clothes, with room for some chairs and all the gear. Easy to set up and take down, though it's a good idea to get some after market tent pegs instead of the thin metal ones standard for most tents I've see.
customer_reviews.author: David Alberts

customer_reviews.title: Good QUALITY, I would highly recommended this to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Good QUALITY , I would highly recommended this to my friends and family. Easy to set up and pack. Would buy it again if I have to.
customer_reviews.author: jedlone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed! Easy to put and take down. Actually fits in its bag with ease. Very good in the rain and wind. I would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Performed well on our first trip. The zippers do ...
customer_reviews.text: Performed well on our first trip. The zippers do seem to be an issue. Can/t believe they haven't changed them. Another Coleman tent we had has a zipper that seems indestructible and easier to use. It rained on our first night and we stayed dry. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Tomdee

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved this tent. The zipper is easy to open. Great design so zipper doesn't get stuck. Love the over hang so rain doesn't come in tent.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle Scheaffer

customer_reviews.title: Our boys loved it and putting it together was not too tough
customer_reviews.text: Worked out well for our 4 person camping trip, we fit two twin size mattresses (foam ones) in there with room for one more! Our boys loved it and putting it together was not too tough, however folding back up was a little less fun.
customer_reviews.author: anna flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Not "dry" camping.
customer_reviews.text: Pole was broken, tent leaked in rain with rain fly on and while covered by EZ up. After checking it seems some of the seams were not stitched with seal tape and others were. Poor workmanship. It's a shame because it's a nice tent. Sent back for refund.,
customer_reviews.author: warren

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: A good tent for the money. Let in too much light though the walls for me, but most tents do. Would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Casey W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set and waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this tent over 14 nights now and have had heavy downpour with a puddle underneath with no leakage into the tent. Seems of quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: curtis hirschman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old and I had the tent set up in 15 minutes, so A+ on ease of use. We had a surprise rain storm and the factory weatherproofing kept us dry with no leaks. Great warm weather tent with lots of ventilation. I'm not sure about using it in the cold but our nightly temps dropped down into the low 40's and we were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tent! Lots of space
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent! Lots of space, good height, holds up well in the wind and stays dry in the rain. Great for the price and what we plan on using it for in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Hawks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tent! Well made. Poles are a larger diameter than I expected. Set is easy. Buy new stakes
customer_reviews.author: cacauba

customer_reviews.title: GET THE WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent but top piece does not weather well. Mine got sun damage and ripped and tie down ropes ripped also. Did not last 1 yr. GET THE 3 YR WARRANTY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tent poles split down the middle first first set-up.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is easy to set up. It even stayed nice and dry during a heavy rainfall. However, the first time setting up the tent, one of the poles split length-wise. Will be contacting the manufacturer about this problem. If they can take care of it, my rating for this tent would definitely increase. (Yes I copied someone elses review but altered it a little because they had the exact same problem)
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Great tent, took very little time to set up
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, took very little time to set up, tent poles are nice and sturdy. lots of tent stake tie downs for mild to medium wind. I am 5'9" and can stand up straight in the middle of the tent!!!!!! Plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks nice
customer_reviews.text: we actually did not get a chance to take it on a camping trip this summer but i set it up on my front lawn to check it out. it went up fine and looked really nice. no regrets
customer_reviews.author: eli in balt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good tent
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good tent. The only thing that's annoying is that you have to zip the zipper very slow or it'll keep getting caught. Other than that, it definitely served it's purpose!
customer_reviews.author: kms5384

customer_reviews.title: It ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, looks good so far no leaks no mold after few months good price, not quaity material
customer_reviews.author: Dominik Bazula

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: It is raining a lot and inside the tent is bone dry. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex J. Pantoja

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent to camp at a festival in the Caribbean. It was perfect! Comfortably fit a queen sized luxury air bed and 2 folding chairs with room left to move around. It was well ventilated, so it didn’t get too hot during the day and it cooled down quickly in the evening. It’s my first tent and I found it easy to set up with 2 people and I took it down by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Yejide

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new tent. Great tent at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: RENFOX

customer_reviews.title: and it's pretty roomy. The zippers worked great too
customer_reviews.text: Used it on a car camping trip with the family, and it's pretty roomy. The zippers worked great too, as did the rain fly.
customer_reviews.author: axio

customer_reviews.title: The tent was easy to put up and seems of fairly good quality
customer_reviews.text: We just received the tent last weekend and used it twice. The tent was easy to put up and seems of fairly good quality. It didn't rain so that will be the next test. I wish the tent stakes were a little better so I may order better ones for times when it may be a little more windy. I will have to use a few more times yet to see how it holds up and will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: klm

customer_reviews.title: Great big tent
customer_reviews.text: Great big tent, easy to set up, set up took me about 5 minutes once everything was unpacked(alone) a struggle to get it back into the bag it came in though, but eventually got it in.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Goodreau

customer_reviews.title: Shock cord snapped, left pole useless.
customer_reviews.text: It was great the first time I used it a month ago when I purchased it. Took it out this past Labor Day weekend to discover the shock cord snapped in one tent pole. Had to duct table it together to have a functional tent. It was just a drag to discover the return window closed a day before I discovered the break.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Tent is very well made and stayed dry through an all night rain.
customer_reviews.text: Very big tent for two adults and a labrador! Plenty of room for gear as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pwatermoose

customer_reviews.title: would buy again'
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent' bought two different tents' I received this on in great condition' lovely tent with nice venting.
customer_reviews.author: chele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This size is perfect to me. Great quality product. i'll enjoy it with my family. thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: juan j.

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, fits two queen blows up perfect with a little extra space
customer_reviews.author: Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used this tent only once but it appears of good quality. We went cold camping and it certainly built in warmth over the night.
customer_reviews.author: ashley place

customer_reviews.title: Really good tent and love that is so big
customer_reviews.text: Really good tent and love that is so big. We camped in the Keys and it was pouring rain, we really thought water was going to get in, and no, no water what so ever got inside.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed!! Like other tents I have bought over the past few years the polls are the issue! They crack and break under the pressure of setting the tent up!! Then the sleeve tears as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Man with foot

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Took this tent out for the first time for a 4 day camping trip. The 1st w evening we got some rain and then a big storm rolled in; thunder, lightning, high winds and a torrential downpour of rain. I must admit I was expecting to go inside and see spots of water on the floor... NOTHING! Completely dry! This tent completely earns the 5 stars I'm giving it.
customer_reviews.author: Tinazhere

customer_reviews.title: Fragile Poles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for camping, and unfortunately haven't been able to camp since I got the tent for him in 2018. He went to use it for the very first time a couple of months ago and a pole snapped in half. The poles are fiberglass and not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin Strausbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I've done a lot of back country camping in small tents. This sets up just as easily a small tent, but has plenty of room for 2 people, air mattress, gear, and room to move around and dress/undress. Really don't know why you'd spent more.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good construction held up great in wind and rain. Very open, best for warm weather
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: 2 queen mattress would be snug inside.
customer_reviews.text: We put an 12-in thick inflatable queen mattress in here so I don’t know about sleeping 6 unless it was sleeping-bag arrangements but it’s comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Angie N.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and nice tent.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent for the money. It's well made, durable and sets up easily. I have used it a dozen times at least, with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Had severe thunderstorm and heavy rain. We stayed dry no leaks. Totally waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Tedmar

customer_reviews.title: Queen size is ok in it but it’s not going to leave a lot of room to move about
customer_reviews.text: My tent was awesome! We went through a fairly strong storm , I was inside of a cottage at the time . My tent just outside, and she huffed and puffed but I only had less than a half a cup of water on the very bottom side the storm can in on !
customer_reviews.author: Anita Minardi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this tent, lots of room and set-up was not bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for warm weather
customer_reviews.text: Great tent for warm weather. Be careful if you're using a tall queen air mattress. You will have to inflate it inside the tent as it does not fit through the door opening fully inflated. Super easy to assemble. Took me about 6-7 mins to do by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Robison

customer_reviews.title: Good tent
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, kept up through rain!! Really cold on cold nights. This tent is better for summer and spring camping because how ventilated it is.
customer_reviews.author: Akasi'Yah Israel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great. Easy set-up, easy take-down. Plenty of space for two, I am 5' 11" and can stand up inside.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Charles Deck

customer_reviews.title: easy set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Lots of space, easy set up and take down!! Can take the top off for a screened in view of the stars at night...love this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not truly waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: So i slept in this tent last night in light rain. Rain did not come through the roof but water definitely comes in from the ground. Aside from that issue it's a large tent worth the money, it just sucks that this thing has water coming in from the bottom and that i'm drenched...
customer_reviews.author: Ox yueller

customer_reviews.title: Best tent ever
customer_reviews.text: We camped out two nights!! It rained and there were zillions of bugs but stayed dry inside and no bugs got in!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Skoda

customer_reviews.title: Used about a dozen time now.
customer_reviews.text: Tent goes up quick by one person in about 10 minutes. Has been through a wind and rain storm had held up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put put
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put put. It fits two queen sizes air beds. Wonderful size inside. MUST BUY 5 STARS ALL THE WAY
customer_reviews.author: puceron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to set up, very good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent, very easy to set up. My 10 year is able to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is not exactly a review. I need help. Soil is a bit soft because it rain for a few days now and this is my first set up since I purchase last month. The description in the bag uses the term pole connectors. Sho my question is, are we talking about key rings? And do I put the poles through the key ring? I'm totally outta whack with this. Thanks you all
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size, we were able to fit in 3 adults and two kids and still had room
customer_reviews.author: Connelly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, excellent quality and workmanship. It rained torrentially at the campsite from 9:00pm to 4:30am and never leaked a drop. Very impressed overall except for stakes. (purchase better stakes)
customer_reviews.author: shawn j hubauer

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily.
customer_reviews.text: Held up fairly well, although during periods of moderate wind it felt like the ten would collapse. Rain cover worked well, BUT the anchor poin tore on first use and the anchor point on the front of the tent tore on first use. Wildly disappointing....
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: As a novice camper I found this tent relatively easy in setting up. Very spacious for one person. Had a queen air mattress and also a chair and table inside during a brief passing rain shower. Had to be a little careful with the zipper. It’s not rigid and I can imagine it getting caught in the flaps. It worked very well for me and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Miltenberger

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: 2 days in the Idaho rain and didn't get wet. A little cold for low temps but perfect for great weather season. Tent is large and very roomy!
customer_reviews.author: A Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Packs up nicely. Love the air vents, and overhead storage/lantern hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

product_meta.title: CORE 6 Person Dome Tent 11' x9'
product_meta.description: Explore the outdoors with the latest in tent technology from CORE Equipment! The CORE 6 Person Dome Tent 11' x 9' features Core H20 Block Technology- water repellent fabrics with active bead technology for faster water runoff paired with sealed seams and rain-resistant door/window seals. The fully-taped rain fly is removable in warmer weather to expose panoramic mesh windows and ceiling. The advanced venting system uses the adjustable air intake vent designed to draw in cool air from the ground while the mesh ceiling allows hot air to escape keeping you comfortable all season. This six person dome tent also features zippered privacy panels on doors and windows and keeps your gear organized with the included gear loft with lantern hook and organizer pockets.
feature_bullets: Sleeps 6 people; Fits two queen air mattresses; Center Height: 72
CORE H20 Block Technology and adjustable ground vent
Features gear loft with lantern hook and pockets to keep items organized and off the tent floor
Includes rain fly, tent stakes, and carry bag
1 YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: We strive for total satisfaction with all of our products.
